content.text:
[@sami](@YND2Cb9uk3ZdFyzXpaXDH5HZ9udu+qjg4MhNcynK2RE=.ed25519)

> wasting energy fighting about it has no meaning

Maybe I'm out of the loop, could you link me to where people are fighting? My understanding is that we have a bunch of idealists trying to figure out the best way to share a new resource, and I don't see anything I'd describe as "little dogs fight[ing] for scraps" but maybe I haven't been paying enough attention.
